MeasurementToolMetadata.Description:
Wortschatztest â€“ vocabulary test

Reference:
Schmidt, K.-H., Metzler, P. (1992): Wortschatztest (WST). Beltz Test GmbH

Assessing verbal intelligence through a vocabulary test.

Task description:
Total of 42 word sets. Each set has one target word and five distractors. Participants have to identify the one target word. No time limit for the completion of the task.

WST_1.Description: WST raw data; how many real words did the participant correctly indicated.
